events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size I ordered does not fit me at all and I do not want to keep it.
The customer's request involves wanting to return a product due to improper fit; thus it matches refund criteria.
Assigning this refund-related case to Refund Department Agent 5 for further handling and resolution.
